sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name, 

  

Good news! Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Job Number - Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Project Title (LINK "https://otterboxtest.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fx_otte2_creative_f_creative_requests.do%3Fsys_id%3DTrigger - Record Updated➛...➛Sys ID") has been approved by Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Name

  

Your request is now real and in the queue for project managers to verify and assign resources. 

  

You'll be notified again once your very own Creative Project Manager has been assigned and your request moves from the ‘in queue” phase to the ‘working’ phase. 

  

Stay tuned. 

  

Thanks, 

The Creative PM Team 
 
If you have any questions about this process, please refer to this document [PPT] or email creativepms@otterproducts.com (please include brief number and title in subject line).

Hi Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name, 

  

Uh oh! Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Job Number - Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Project Title (link) has been denied by Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Name

  

Your request is now pending approval again. You may access your request here or on your ServiceNow dashboard, edit or amend information, then submit again for approval. 

  

Reason for denial (if provided): 

Copy from denial note 

 

Thanks, 

The Creative PM Team 
 
If you have any questions about this process, please refer to this document [PPT] or email creativepms@otterproducts.com (please include brief number and title in subject line).

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name, 

  

Good news! Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Job Number - Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Project Title (LINK "https://otterboxtest.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fx_otte2_creative_f_creative_requests.do%3Fsys_id%3DTrigger - Record Updated➛...➛Sys ID") has been approved by Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Name

  

Your request is now real and in the queue for project managers to verify and assign resources. 

  

You'll be notified again once your very own Creative Project Manager has been assigned and your request moves from the ‘in queue” phase to the ‘working’ phase. 

  

Stay tuned. 

  

Thanks, 

The Creative PM Team 
 
If you have any questions about this process, please refer to this document [PPT] or email creativepms@otterproducts.com (please include brief number and title in subject line).

Hi Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name, 

  

Uh oh! Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Job Number - Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Project Title (link) has been denied by Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Name

  

Your request is now pending approval again. You may access your request here or on your ServiceNow dashboard, edit or amend information, then submit again for approval. 

  

Reason for denial (if provided): 

Copy from denial note 

 

Thanks, 

The Creative PM Team 
 
If you have any questions about this process, please refer to this document [PPT] or email creativepms@otterproducts.com (please include brief number and title in subject line).
